query: SQL Injection vulnerability in login form

cves.description: WebDamn User Registration Login System contains a SQL injection vulnerability that allows unauthenticated attackers to bypass login authentication by manipulating email credentials. Attackers can inject the payload '<email>' OR '1'='1' in both username and password fields to gain unauthorized access to the user panel.
